How many people are affected by neurofibromatosis type 1 ?,"Neurofibromatosis type 1 occurs in 1 in 3,000 to 4,000 people worldwide.",GHR,neurofibromatosis type 1
What are the genetic changes related to neurofibromatosis type 1 ?,"Mutations in the NF1 gene cause neurofibromatosis type 1.  The NF1 gene provides instructions for making a protein called neurofibromin. This protein is produced in many cells, including nerve cells and specialized cells sur
